headline: Althera42: The New Fund Bringing the Music Royalties Model to Tech Investments
summary: If you can invest in music royalties, why can't you also invest in "technology royalties?" That's what Althera42 wants to make possible, betting on revenue growth and scalability of technology startups without having to buy in at high valuations. Founded by Caspar Macqueen, a former BlackRock executive, and Christian Czernich, founder of the private credit firm Round2 Capital, the new fund plans to provide working capital to technology companies in Europe without taking an equity stake. Althera4

headline: ‘Solana Is the New Wall Street,’ Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan Explains
summary: Hougan said Solana’s speed, throughput and finality make it “extraordinarily attractive” for those choosing which blockchain to invest in.

raw.headline: ‘Solana Is the New Wall Street,’ Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan Explains

headline: Are private assets the answer to retirement savings shortfalls?
summary: More than 4 in 10 Gen Z, millennial, and Gen X workers say they’re living paycheck to paycheck and skimping on retirement savings, according to a new Goldman Sachs Asset Management report. It offers some solutions.

raw.headline: Are private assets the answer to retirement savings shortfalls?

headline: Why The Narrative Around BlackRock Is Shifting Amid Analyst Updates and Fresh Developments
summary: BlackRock's fair value estimate has recently risen from $1,167.20 to $1,203.69. This change reflects analysts' stronger outlook on the firm's long-term potential. The updated price target incorporates increased optimism about the company's ability to generate revenue growth and navigate shifting market conditions. Stay tuned to discover how investors can track these evolving expectations and better understand the changing narrative around BlackRock stock. What Wall Street Has Been...
